titleStmt.title: Shall I? Shall I? No, no. A wanton lad and comely lass did once together meet; tho she seem'd coy her heart he won with complements most sweet. Tune of, The doubting virgin.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby at the Harp & Ball in Pye corner,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Pretty Betty now come to me ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
